extends Object

        Parameters:

      • parseContent

        public static Content parseContent(Element contentParentElem)
        Parse a ContentOptionalRefType or ContentRequiredRefType kind of DOM element.
        Parameters:
        contentParentElem - The DOM element being the parent of the content element.
        Returns:
        The Content API object containing the data from the given DOM element.

      • parseDateTime

        public static Date parseDateTime(Element requestElem,
                 String dateTimeXPath)
                          throws MOAApplicationException
        Get the signing time from a Verfiy(CMS|XML)SignatureRequest.
        Parameters:
        requestElem - A Verify(CMS|XML)SignatureRequest DOM element.
        dateTimeXPath - The XPath to lookup the DateTime element within the request.
        Returns:
        Date The date and time corresponding to the DateTime element in the request. If no DateTime element exists in the request, null is returned.
        Throws:
        MOAApplicationException - An error occurred during a parsing the DateTime element or creating the return value.
